channel.title: Read Rust
channel.description: Rust related posts from around the internet.

item.title: Introduction to lyon: 2D vector graphics rendering on the GPU in Rust
item.description: Lyon is a side-project that I have been working on for quite a while. The goal is to play with rendering 2D vector graphics on the GPU, and it's been a lot of fun so far. I haven't talked a lot about it online (except for a couple of reddit threads a year or two ago) so I figured it would be a good topic to get this blog started.
item.dc:creator: Nical
